response.original_title: Γιάννης Κυριόπουλος: Ο Σύγχρονος Διανοούμενος και ο Θεμελιωτής των Οικονομικών της Υγείας
response.overview: Yannis Kyriopoulos is a Greek academic internationally recognized as a pioneer who combined the study of health with economics and politics. His work has had a significant impact, as it contributed to the promotion of social justice. After his death, his legacy continues to inspire and guide his colleagues and students. The narratives of his friends, associates, and students highlight his multifaceted personality and his spiritual legacy.
response.title: Yannis Kyriopoulos: The Modern Intellectual and the Founder of Health Economics

results.name: #TIDF26 | Yannis Kyriopoulos: The Modern Intellectual and the Founder of Health Economics
